actions.in_committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain lands in Placer County, California, to Mrs. Edna C. Marshall, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey to a named individual all right, title, and interest of the United States in and to a tract of land in Tahoe National Forest, Placer County, California, upon proper application and payment.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain lands in Placer County, California, to Mrs. Edna C. Marshall, and for other purposes.
